ygData.subject: Re: Banks
ygData.msgSnippet: the camping problem is directly related to twinkers.  when someone is camping an item, they get their item and should move on....but they don t....they
ygData.messageBody:
the camping problem is directly related to twinkers. when someone is camping an item, they get their item and should move on....but they don't....they continue to camp to get more items to twink their guild buddies, or to twink their other characters.....mean while I can't get the item due to their twinking.....direct relationship there.

The people who deserve the items are the ones that are willing to get them with the character that is going to use them......ie no camping rubicite with your 40th lvl wizard to give to your 5th lvl warrior

greedy bastards all over the place, ruining the game for everyone simply so they can twink out their newbie characters or friends, blah

>>> Mark Guckeyson <mguckeyson@...> 6.1.99 9:57:49 AM >>>
From: mguckeyson@... (Mark Guckeyson)

What's crazy about level 5 in rubicite? It's odd, even frustrating, but
so what? You haven't answered my question; merely given another example
of it. Now the camping situation is something entirely different... and
not directly related to twinking. Do you think that if they weren't
twinking they'd move on? I sure don't. I'm willing to bet they'd just
camp then sell the things. Actually, I'd prefer to see someone camping
for the sole purpose of giving 'em away. After all, that just means that
whoever they're giving them to will have no reason to camp there. And
how do you determine who 'deserves' the items? I think you're speaking
on a level of personal frustration... which is completely
understandable, but difficult to defend logically.

In any case, here's to few campers, great loot drops and wildly
efficient xp.
mark

Jason Coan wrote:
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> depends on what is being twinked.....a lvl 5 in full rubicite is crazy. Not only that, but people who twink out their other characters like this are the people who FARM items. They camp until they get their item, which I don't have a problem with, then they continue to camp camp camp camp camp to get crap for their guild buddies and for their lower lvl characters, depriving the people who DESERVE the items the chance to get them....and thats where I have a problem with twinking.
